formattedAddress: 40 W 117th St, New York, NY 10026, USA
adrFormatAddress: 40 W 117th St, New York, NY 10026, USA

originalText.text: Smile Space offers a wonderful experience. From the receptionist to the CEO, everyone was welcoming and very knowledgeable. They offer various beverages, a VERY clean work environment, as well as lite music while you wait. The dental service was exceptional as they explained a recommended treatment plan and worked with care and concern. Every question was explained in full. The surgical equipment used is modern. It’s  even made sure you don’t leave with ashy lips! Highly recommended. I look forward to completing my dental needs with them forwardly.

originalText.text: Amazing, I am never this quick to rate a place but this place deserves a rating ASAP. The staff and customer service was phenomenal this is the kind of customer service I look for everywhere. We had a fun conversation before I saw Mr.Black, which I usually never have conversations with people in establishments like this. It made me comfortable and want to come back. They got me in and out quick and solved the problem I had and didn’t try to make me do anything else that was unneeded. If I could wear a shirt advertising this place I would. This was the highlight of my day!

originalText.text: I am not a person who recommends dentists but SmileSpace is the WHOLE PACKAGE!!! From the time you walk in the staff is extremely friendly and the ambiance is amazing. Diana greeted me with a big smile and made sure I was comfortable the whole time. Dr. Black is very friendly honest and by far the best dentist I've ever had. Thank you SmileSpace for rebuilding my confidence in going back to the dentist.

text.text: I am not a person who recommends dentists but SmileSpace is the WHOLE PACKAGE!!! From the time you walk in the staff is extremely friendly and the ambiance is amazing. originalText.text: Loved the experience right from the ladies at the front: Dominique and Diana, they kept it fun and professional. My dental hygienist, Gaby as well as my x-ray tech were exceptional. Dr. Black made me feel relaxed and patiently explained everything to me and listened to me. Atmosphere is like no other; great ambiance, relaxing music. I kept forgetting that I was at a dental clinic. Glad my wife found them.

originalText.text: Amazing experience… this appointment is just another in a long line of great experiences at the dentist of all places. Talk about amazing facilities, start of the art and I got to vibe to some tunes and watch shows on Netflix. Pain free experience. I travelled from bk all the way to Harlem and he will be seeing me again. Appreciate you Doc!
